summary: Provides test support utilities such as an in‑memory file object and a mock implementation of the built‑in open function, along with helper routines for handling image augmentation transforms and configuring deterministic random seeds. These tools allow tests to simulate file I/O and manipulate augmentation pipelines without accessing the real filesystem.
business_intent: Enable reliable, isolated testing of image processing and augmentation code by mocking file operations and offering deterministic configuration utilities.
